FindTheCulprit.MissingDependency: {module} requires a module with ID {dependency} as a dependency, which is not installed!
FindTheCulprit.DisabledDependency: {module} requires {dependency} as a dependency, which is not enabled!

BinarySearchStep.StatsData: Step {currentStep}: {numRemaining} modules still suspect. {stepsLeft} or fewer step(s) remain.

Tooltip.Pinned: Pinned: Activated at all times during the search
Tooltip.Excluded: Excluded: Disabled for the duration of the search
Tooltip.Exonerated: Exonerated: You have indicated that the issue did not persist while this module was active
Tooltip.ExoneratedButActive: Exonerated (Active): Despite being exonerated, this module is active because a non-exonerated active module requires it as a dependency

StateTooltip.active: Active: Currently active for this test step
StateTooltip.culprit: Culprit: The module causing (one of) your issue(s)
StateTooltip.excluded: Excluded: Disabled for the duration of the search
StateTooltip.exonerated: Exonerated: You indicated that the issue did not persist while this module was active
StateTooltip.exoneratedButActive: Exonerated (Active): Despite being exonerated, this module is active because one or more active suspect modules require it as a dependency
StateTooltip.inactive: Inactive: Still suspect, but not active this step
StateTooltip.pinned: Pinned: Active at all times during the search

Error.Singleton: Only one FindTheCulprit app is allowed to exist.

FoundTheCulprit.HasSelected: You have {count} modules selected, any of which may be your true culprit.
FoundTheCulprit.HasPinned: You have {count} modules pinned, any of which may be your true culprit.

ErrorDialog.EncounteredError: Find the Culprit encountered an error:
ErrorDialog.Direction: The module's data can be found in the console as an Error to assist with bug reporting. Clicking the button below or closing this dialog will return your world to it's pre-FtC-run state.

IPWOS.BlameModules: , or in one of your pinned modules:
IPWOS.BlameCoreOrSystem: Seems like the issue is a bug in the game system or the core software

Tooltip.Enabled: All modules marked as libraries are force locked.
Tooltip.Disabled: Library modules are being treated normally.

Tooltip.Enabled: All connected clients will reload along with the GM
Tooltip.Disabled: Only the GM client will reload

clearAll.Label: Clear All
clearAll.Tooltip: Sets every module to unlocked and unselected

ModuleTooltip.Preamble: This module is force pinned because:
ModuleTooltip.LockedLibrary: It is a library and the Lock Libraries toggle is enabled
ModuleTooltip.DependencyOf: It is a dependency of pinned module(s) {pinnedDependants}
ModuleTooltip.Pinned: Pinned: will be enabled at all times during the search
ModuleTooltip.Excluded: Excluded: will be disabled for the duration of the search
ModuleTooltip.Search: Search: This module is in the pool of potential culprits

Tooltip.Locked: This module is locked. Click to unlock it.
Tooltip.Unlocked: This module is unlocked. Click to lock it. Locked status is remembered.
Tooltip.Forced: This module cannot be unlocked while the Lock Libraries toggle is enabled.

SelectMods.DisabledBecauseLocked: To deselect this module, unlock it first.
SelectMods.ForceLockedBecauseLibraryTooltip: This module cannot be unlocked while the Lock Libraries toggle is enabled.
SelectMods.LockedTooltip: This module is locked. Click to unlock it.
SelectMods.LibrariesLockedTooltip: All modules marked as libraries are force locked.
SelectMods.LibrariesUnlockedTooltip: Library modules are being treated normally.
SelectMods.DoReloadAllClientsTooltip: All connected clients will reload along with the GM
SelectMods.DontReloadAllClientsTooltip: Only the GM client will reload
SelectMods.UnlockedTooltip: This module is unlocked. Click to lock it. Locked status is remembered.

Usage.P1: After clicking Start, the page will refresh and you will be prompted to check whether your issue still exists. This may repeat multiple times until the culprit was found.
Usage.P2: After the culprit was found you will be able to choose whether you want to return your active modules list to its pre-run state.
Usage.P3: Don't worry if you accidently close one of the popups, just refresh the page manually and it will reappear.

StartOfRun.AllModulesDeactivated: All modules except Find the Culprit are deactivated.
StartOfRun.AllButSelectedDeactivated: All modules, except those pinned and Find the Culprit itself, are deactivated.
StartOfRun.MaxSteps: Searching will take at most {maxSteps} steps.
